headline: Exxon Mobil Continues To Benefit From Advantaged Upstream
summary: Exxon Mobil delivers record production, strong cash flow, and robust shareholder returns with growth to 5.4M barrels/day by 2030. Learn why XOM stock is a buy.

headline: ExxonMobil (XOM): Slowing Revenue Growth Challenges Bullish Narratives Despite High-Quality Earnings
summary: Exxon Mobil (XOM) posted yearly revenue growth of just 0.7%, trailing well behind the broader US market’s 10.4% pace. EPS is forecast to rise 8.7% per year moving forward, also falling short of the US average of 15.9%. While the company previously booked robust 32.4% annualized earnings growth over five years, its current net profit margin has dipped to 9.4% from 9.9% last year, and earnings slipped over the past year. Despite this recent slowdown, Exxon’s price-to-earnings ratio of 15.7x...
